name: Arnikko's Pizzeria
text:

Pizza
PEPPERONI & CHEESE A blend of cupping and flat pepperoni over classic mozzarella. $18.99

CHEESE Nothing more to be said - simple and satisfying. $15.99

CANADIAN EH Our version of a Canadian classic: mushrooms, onions, roasted peppers, bacon, shaved ham, and a drizzle of maple syrup. $22.99

HULA HELL YOU THINK YOU ARE? HAWAIIAN?! Shaved ham & pineapple - sweet and salty in all the right ways. $19.99

MEATLOVERS Shaved ham, pepperoni, bacon, beef crumble stacked to satisfy. $25.99

THE STALLONE Italian sausage, salami, olives, roasted peppers, and ricotta. A heavyweight pie. $25.99

VEGGIE PIZZA (HOUSE COMBO) Chef's choice of assorted house vegetables. $22.00

THE WESTON DELUXE Homemade sausage, shaved ham, bacon, roasted peppers, onions, and olives. $22.99

Slice & Can of Pop $6.50
SOLD ALL DAY, EVERY DAY!

VEGGIES & MORE: Tomato, roasted peppers, onion, mushrooms, banana peppers, jalape√±os, pineapple, green olives, black olives, ricotta, mozzarella

Salads
Fresh daily salads available - ask us what's fresh today! More menu items coming soon.
